values:
.








the pen hits the page, 
unleashing a deluge of emotion 

the pain, 
fear 
flowing like water 
through trembling hands 

ashes 
the only trace 
of the time gone bye 

sweet saline  
deludes my thoughts 

drowning my words 
in a running river 
of black ink...

I don't quite know what will come of this, 
but I need to start writing again, 
or lose my mind... 
one of the two
(perhaps its a bit too late for the latter)

at this point I am
a failing husband,
a struggling father
and a grieving son...

much was lost
stolen

my father
my family
my optimism

and I fear, 
the last 
may never return...

insperation comes from nothing....




Sitting here,
Looking down
at a random sea
of worn out squares.
Their faces rubbed out,
by countless years
of abuse
Leaving them dull
And expressionless
Yet now...
They seem to find
new life
in my plight...
